body_html:
Let's re-make this change possibly via an option to DecodeJpegOp, rather than flipping the default everywhere.

+1 This should obviously be the default, but retaining the option for slow high quality is a good thing.
BTW, this op contributes significantly to multi-GPU inception training being bottlenecked on host CPU.

body:
> Let's re-make this change possibly via an option to DecodeJpegOp, rather than flipping the default everywhere.

+1   This should obviously be the default, but retaining the option for slow high quality is a good thing.
BTW, this op contributes significantly to multi-GPU inception training being bottlenecked on host CPU.
